## IReturnClickOptions interface

Options for a prompt with a custom return value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IReturnClickOptions<TReturn> extends IClickOptions 
```
**Extends:** [IClickOptions](./bge-core.iclickoptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [return](./bge-core.ireturnclickoptions.return.md) |  | TReturn | When the player responds to the prompt, resolve with this value. |
